name: Yellow Bird
preparation: Pour all ingredients into a cocktail shaker, shake well with ice, strain into chilled cocktail glass.

name: Trinidad Sour
preparation: Pour all ingredients into a cocktail shaker, shake well with ice, strain into chilled cocktail glass.

name: Tommy's margarita
preparation: Shake and strain into a chilled cocktail glass.

name: Tipperary
preparation: Pour all ingredients into mixing glass with ice cubes. Stir well. Strain into chilled cocktail glass. Garnish with a slice of orange.

name: Suffering Bastard
preparation: Shake everything but ginger beer with ice, pour unstrained into glass, top with ginger beer.

name: Aperol Spritz
preparation: Build all ingredients into a wine glass filled with ice. Stir gently.

name: Russian Spring Punch
preparation: Pour all ingredients into cocktail shaker except the sparkling wine, shake well with ice, strain into chilled tall tumbler glass filled with ice and top up with sparkling wine.

name: Penicillin
preparation: Muddle fresh ginger in a shaker and add the remaining ingredients, except for the Lagavulin whisky. Fill the shaker with ice and shake. Double-strain into a chilled old fashioned glass with ice. Float the Lagavulin whisky on top.

name: Paper Plane
preparation: Pour all ingredients into cocktail shaker, shake well with ice, strain into chilled cocktail glass.

name: Paloma
preparation: Pour the tequila into a highball glass, squeeze the lime juice. Add ice and salt, fill up pink grapefruit soda. Stir gently.

name: Old Cuban
preparation: Pour all ingredients except the wine into cocktail shaker, shake well with ice, strain into chilled elegant cocktail glass. Top up with the sparkling wine and garnish with mint sprigs.

name: New York Sour
preparation: Pour the whiskey, syrup, lemon juice, and egg white into shaker with ice cubes. Shake vigorously. Strain into chilled rocks glass filled with ice. Float the wine on top. Garnish with lemon or orange zest and cherry.
garnish: Lemon or orange zest and cherry

name: Naked and Famous
preparation: Pour all ingredients into shaker with ice cubes. Shake well. Strain into chilled cocktail glass.

name: Lemon Drop
preparation: Pour all ingredients into cocktail shaker, shake well with ice, strain into chilled cocktail glass. Garnish with sugar rim around the glass.

name: Illegal
preparation: Pour all ingredients into shaker with ice cubes. Shake vigorously. Strain into chilled cocktail glass, or "on the rocks" into a traditional clay or terracotta mug.

name: Fernet con Coca
preparation: Fill a double old-fashioned glass with ice. Pour in the Fernet-Branca, fill the glass with cola. Stir gently.

name: Espresso Martini
preparation: Pour all ingredients into cocktail shaker, shake well with ice, strain into chilled cocktail glass.

name: Canchanchara
preparation: Mix honey with water and lime juice and spread the mixture on the bottom and sides of the glass. Add cracked ice, and then the rum. End by energetically stirring from bottom to top.

name: Bee's Knees
preparation: Stir honey syrup with lemon and orange juices until it dissolves, add gin and shake with ice. Strain into chilled cocktail glass.
garnish: Optionally garnish with lemon or orange zest

name: Barracuda
preparation: Shake pour ingredients with ice. Strain into glass, top with sparkling wine.

name: Zombie
preparation: Mix ingredients in a shaker with crushed ice. Pour into a tall tumbler glass.

name: Vesper
preparation: Pour all ingredients into a cocktail shaker filled with ice cubes. Shake and strain into a chilled cocktail glass.

name: Tequila sunrise
preparation: Pour the tequila and orange juice into glass over ice. Add the grenadine, which will sink to the bottom. Stir gently to create the sunrise effect. Garnish and serve.

name: Singapore Sling
preparation: Pour all ingredients into cocktail shaker filled with ice cubes. Shake well. Strain into highball glass. Garnish with pineapple and cocktail cherry.

name: Sex on the Beach
preparation: Build all ingredients in a highball glass filled with ice. Garnish with orange slice.

name: Sea Breeze
preparation: Build all ingredients in a highball glass filled with ice. Garnish with lime wedge.

name: Pisco sour
preparation: Vigorously shake contents in a cocktail shaker with ice cubes, then strain into a glass and garnish with bitters.

name: Piña Colada
preparation: Blend all the ingredients with ice in an electric blender, pour into a large goblet or Hurricane glass and serve.

name: Moscow mule
preparation: Combine vodka and ginger beer in a highball glass filled with ice. Add lime juice. Stir gently. Garnish.

name: Mojito
preparation: Mix mint sprigs with sugar and lime juice. Add splash of soda water and fill the glass with ice. Pour the rum and top with soda water. Light stir to involve all ingredients.
garnish: Sprigs of mint and slice of lime

name: Mint Julep
preparation: In a highball glass gently muddle the mint, sugar and water. Fill the glass with cracked ice, add Bourbon and stir well until the glass is well frosted. Garnish with a mint sprig.

name: Mimosa
preparation: Ensure both ingredients are well chilled, then mix into the glass. Serve cold.

name: Margarita
preparation: Add all ingredients into a shaker with ice. Shake and strain into a chilled cocktail glass.

name: Mai Tai
preparation: Add all ingredients into a shaker with ice. Shake and pour into a double rocks glass or a highball glass.
garnish: pineapple spear, mint leaves, and lime peel

name: Long Island Iced Tea
preparation: Add all ingredients into highball glass filled with ice. Stir gently. Optionally garnish with lemon slice.

name: Kir
preparation: Add the crème de cassis to the bottom of the glass, then top up with wine.

name: Horse's Neck
preparation: Pour brandy and ginger ale directly into highball glass with ice cubes. Stir gently. Garnish with lemon zest. If desired, add dashes of Angostura Bitter.

name: Hemingway Special
preparation: Pour all ingredients into a shaker with ice. Shake.

name: Grasshopper
preparation: Pour ingredients into a cocktail shaker with ice. Shake briskly and then strain into a chilled cocktail glass.

name: Golden Dream
preparation: Shake with cracked ice. Strain into glass and serve.

name: French Connection
preparation: Pour all ingredients directly into old fashioned glass filled with ice cubes. Stir gently.

name: French 75
preparation: Combine gin, syrup, and lemon juice in a cocktail shaker filled with ice. Shake vigorously and strain into a chilled champagne glass. Top up with champagne. Stir gently.

name: Rum and Coke
preparation: Build all ingredients in a highball glass filled with ice. Garnish with lime wedge.

name: Cosmopolitan
preparation: Shake all ingredients in cocktail shaker filled with ice. Strain into a large cocktail glass. Garnish with lime slice.

name: Black Russian
preparation: Pour the ingredients into the old fashioned glass filled with ice cubes. Stir gently.

name: Bellini
preparation: Pour peach purée into chilled glass, add sparkling wine. Stir gently.

name: White Lady
preparation: Add all ingredients into cocktail shaker filled with ice. Shake well and strain into large cocktail glass.

name: Vieux Carré
preparation: Pour all ingredients into mixing glass with ice cubes. Stir well. Strain into a chilled cocktail glass.

name: Tuxedo
preparation: Stir all ingredients with ice and strain into a cocktail glass. Garnish with a cherry and a twist of lemon zest.

name: Stinger
preparation: Pour all ingredients into mixing glass with ice cubes. Stir well. Strain into chilled martini cocktail glass.

name: Sidecar
preparation: Pour all ingredients into cocktail shaker filled with ice. Shake well and strain into cocktail glass.

name: Sazerac
preparation: Rinse a chilled old-fashioned glass with the absinthe, add crushed ice, and set it aside. Stir the remaining ingredients over ice and set it aside. Discard the ice and any excess absinthe from the prepared glass, and strain the drink into the glass. Add the lemon peel for garnish.

name: Rusty Nail
preparation: Pour all ingredients directly into an old fashioned glass filled with ice. Stir gently.

name: Planter's punch
preparation: Pour all ingredients into a tumbler glass.

name: Old fashioned
preparation: Place sugar cube in old fashioned glass and saturate with bitter, add few dashes of plain water. Muddle until dissolved. Fill the glass with ice cubes and add whiskey. Stir gently. Garnish with orange slice or zest, and a cocktail cherry.
garnish: Orange slice or zest, and cocktail cherry

name: Negroni
preparation: Stir into glass over ice, garnish and serve.

name: Monkey Gland
preparation: Shake well over ice cubes in a shaker, strain into a chilled cocktail glass.

name: Mary Pickford
preparation: Shake and strain into a chilled large cocktail glass.

name: Martinez
preparation: Stirred over ice, strained into a chilled glass, garnished, and served up.

name: Manhattan
preparation: Pour all ingredients into mixing glass with ice cubes. Stir well. Strain into a chilled cocktail glass.

name: Last Word
preparation: Shake with ice and strain into a cocktail glass.

name: John Collins
preparation: Pour all ingredients directly into highball glass filled with ice. Stir gently. Garnish. Add a dash of Angostura bitters.

name: Hanky-Panky cocktail
preparation: Stirred over ice, strained into a chilled glass, garnished, and served up.

name: Martini
preparation: Pour all ingredients into mixing glass with ice cubes. Stir well. Strain into chilled martini cocktail glass.

name: Daiquiri
preparation: In a cocktail shaker add all ingredients. Stir well to dissolve the sugar. Add ice and shake. Strain into chilled cocktail glass.

name: Clover Club Cocktail
preparation: Dry shake ingredients to emulsify, add ice, shake and served straight up.

name: Casino
preparation: Pour all ingredients into shaker with ice cubes. Shake well. Strain into chilled cocktail glass. Garnish with a lemon twist and a maraschino cherry. Serve without a straw.

name: Brandy Crusta
preparation: Mix all ingredients with ice cubes in a mixing glass.  Strain into slim cocktail glass rimmed with sugar.

name: Boulevardier
preparation: Pour all ingredients into mixing glass with ice cubes. Stir well. Strain into a chilled cocktail glass.
garnish: Orange zest, optionally a lemon zest

name: Between the Sheets
preparation: Pour all ingredients into shaker with ice cubes, shake, strain into chilled cocktail glass.

name: Aviation
preparation: Add all ingredients into cocktail shaker filled with ice. Shake well and strain into cocktail glass. Garnish with a cherry.

name: Angel Face
preparation: Pour all ingredients into cocktail shaker filled with ice cubes. Shake and strain into a chilled cocktail glass.

name: Americano
preparation: Pour the Campari and vermouth over ice into an old fashioned glass, add a splash of soda water and garnish with half orange slice and a lemon twist.
garnish: Half an orange slice, lemon twist

name: Alexander
preparation: Pour all ingredients into cocktail shaker filled with ice cubes. Shake and strain into a chilled cocktail glass.
